participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Hardworking and dedicated, Jake has a strong passion for his work and values his family, particularly his pets.
participant_1.background: i am a construction worker. i've 5cats. my cats are very special to me. my dad taught me everything i know.

participant_2.background: i did not graduate high school. i live in canada. my grandfather served in world war a. my favourite food is shawarma.
